title: Prompt Pixel
description: An innovative event where participants type creative prompts and extract critical information from AI-generated visuals, tackling a series of engaging tasks to navigate to their final destination.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: A team must consist of 2 members.
Participants are required to bring their own laptops.
The event consists of multiple rounds.
Participants will generate AI visuals based on prompts.
Teams must extract critical information from the generated visuals.
Participants will complete a series of tasks to reach the final destination.
Any form of malpractice will result in immediate disqualification.
Additional instructions will be given at the start of the event.
Any team that violates the rules or engages in unsportsmanlike conduct may be disqualified.
